modifier.dreamtinker.realsweep.descripti: A easier and much supreme sweep attack; If level larger than 1, the modifiers on the weapon would be trigger as well
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_heavy.descri: if user not have speed/strength, or on a moving live entity, weakness is applied; Otherwise weakness is removed
item.dreamtinker.tntarrow.description: a consumable, special melee weapon.range less than exploding range！
item.dreamtinker.masu.description: Composing poetry while wielding a spear—truly a hero of his time!----a special heave spear that slow and sweep. Need to ride something or with strength effect otherwise apply weakness to self
